church.title: Can we hold our event's religious ceremony at the church adjacent to the Mosteiro?
church.description: Yes, but you must follow parish rules and you will need to contact the parish priest in advance.

services.title: Is it possible to hand-pick specific services for a specific event?
services.description: Of course! We offer a wide range of services but you can choose to take on as many or as few of them as you would like.

time_limit.title: Are there any time limits for events?
time_limit.description: As there ar eno nearby neighbors, there shouldn't be a problem related with noise. However, we do impose a limit until 04h00. If you wish to exceed this, extra fees may apply.

per_weekend.title: When are you open for weddings?
per_weekend.description: Mosteiro de Landim is open for any kind of event throughout the year! However, when it comes to weddings, we only hold one wedding per weekend. This ensures the smooth running of your special day and means you never have to feel rushed.
